verses.verse: After <S%H310>this<s%> it <S%H1732>happened,<s%> that David <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H3947>them,<s%> and took <S%H1661>Gath<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>
He <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> and the <S%H4124>Moabites<s%> became <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H5375>brought<s%> <S%H4503>tribute.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H1928>Hadadezer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah<s%> to <S%H2574>Hamath,<s%> as he <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H5324>establish<s%> his <S%H3027>dominion<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> from him one <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>footmen;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6131>hamstrung<s%> all the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H3498>horses,<s%> but reserved of them for one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots.<s%>
When the Syrians of Damascus came to help Hadadezer king of Zobah, David struck of the Syrians twenty-two thousand men.

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> garrisons in <S%H758>Syria<s%> of <S%H758>Damascus;<s%> and the Syrians became <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H5375>brought<s%> <S%H4503>tribute.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> gave <S%H3467>victory<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> wherever he <S%H1980>went.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7982>shields<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> that were on the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H1928>Hadadezer,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

From <S%H2880>Tibhath<s%> and from <S%H3560>Cun,<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1928>Hadadezer,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5178>brass,<s%> with which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

When <S%H8583>Tou<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H5221>struck<s%> all the <S%H2428>army<s%> of <S%H1928>Hadadezer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah,<s%>

he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H1913>Hadoram<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> to <S%H7592>Greet<s%> <S%H7965>him,<s%> and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H3898>him,<s%> because he had fought against <S%H1928>Hadadezer<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H1928>him;<s%> (for Hadadezer had <S%H376>wars<s%> with <S%H8583>Tou;<s%>) and he had with him all kinds of <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> also <S%H6942>dedicated<s%> these to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> with the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> that he <S%H5375>carried<s%> away from all the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> from <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and from <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and from the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and from <S%H6002>Amalek.<s%>

Moreover <S%H52>Abishai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> of the <S%H123>Edomites<s%> in the <S%H1516>Valley<s%> of <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

He <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H5333>garrisons<s%> in <S%H123>Edom;<s%> and all the <S%H123>Edomites<s%> became <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> gave <S%H3467>victory<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> wherever he <S%H1980>went.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and he <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to all his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
<S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> was over the <S%H6635>army;<s%> and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H286>Ahilud<s%> was <S%H2142>recorder;<s%>

and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%> and <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H54>Abiathar,<s%> were <S%H3548>priests;<s%> and <S%H7798>Shavsha<s%> was <S%H5608>scribe;<s%>

and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> was over the <S%H3774>Cherethites<s%> and the <S%H6432>Pelethites;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> were <S%H7223>chief<s%> <S%H3027>about<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
